title: Crusty ginger sponge with orange creme
ingredients: ['115g unsalted butter', '250g caster sugar', '1 egg', '300g golden syrup', '310g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '3 small bulbs stem ginger, grated', '250 ml hot water', '710 ml double cream', '5 oranges, juiced']
